name: hyper-cutter

effect.sun-moon: Doubles cut's grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Doubles cut's grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Doubles cut's grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

short_effect: Prevents Attack from being lowered by other Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The Pokémon’s proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon’s proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon’s proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
